about_the_game:
Welcome to the dark side of X1! This DLC adds "CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2&2.5+ X1 Dark" compatibility for 11 additional personalities all at once!
"I want to see my favorite maid give in to pleasure!" "I want to see facial expressions she never makes for me!"
This is the pack for twisted masters who've had thoughts like that!
Not a fan of this kind of content? Don't worry, it'll only hurt at first. You'll get used to it little by little.
*This content will not be accessible in-game if NTR Block is set to ON.
*This DLC only contains R18 content. As such, this content will not be added to your game unless you have installed the R18 patch for "CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 It's a Night Magic." Please make sure you've installed this patch before purchase.

-Compatible Personalities-
*Quiet and Loves to be Pampered Bookworm
*Naturally Sadistic Sweet Little Devil
*Sexy and Ladylike Woman
*Mature, Level-Headed, and Dependable Secretary Maid
*Soft Cuddly Girl
*Guarded, Blunt Girl
*Overbearing Preppy Girl Maid
*Sweet, Affectionate, and Devoted Long-lost Friend
*Friendly and slightly naughty woman
*Overly Serious and Reserved Proper Lady
*The Extreme Sadist queen who arouses the hearts of masochists

*You must have installed the corresponding personality packs to play this content with the personalities listed.
*You must have installed ”CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2&2.5+ X1” to play this DLC.

【About Custom Order Maid 3D2& 2.5 +X1 Dark】
The 3rd installment in the X series features a new storyline in which a certain seemingly insignificant event sparks Master’s curiosity:
“What if I had my precious wife-maid sleep with another man?”
X1 Dark is fully compatible with the High Poly Body, allowing you to watch your maids give into temptation in exquisite detail.
Will the maid who vowed to love you forever come back to you in the end, or will she give herself over to the pleasure offered by complete strangers?

1. Brand-New NTR Story!
This pack adds a new storyline, “Netorase Honeymoon.” It features your beloved wife-maid fooling around with a paramour at the Empire Club, Honeymoon Hotel, and the new “Dance Bar” background.

2.New Yotogi!
“Netorase Honeymoon” also includes 24 new yotogi skills for you to try out!

You must have the "Custom Order Maid 3D2" base game, "Custom Order Maid 3D2&2.5 + X1","Custom Order Maid 3D2&2.5 + X1 Dark"in order to play this expansion pack.
If you have “Custom Order Maid 3D2.5 + X0 with Kiss Character Edit System,” you can enjoy the contents of this expansion pack with the High Poly Body.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains adult content intended for individuals 18 years of age or older.
It includes nudity, sex scene, and blatantly sexual imagery, as well as imagery that has sexual implications.
If you are not yet 18+ or if you are accessing from any country or located where adult material is specifically prohibited by law, do not play this game.
